title: We are Scurb!

embed.description: Just an introduction so you guys know what we're up to and what you can expect in the future! Social media! http://www.twitch.tv/scurbtv https://www.facebook.com/ScurbOfficial https://twitter.com/ScurbOfficial http://instagram.com/scurbofficial/

body:
Hey guys!
Many of you would know me as the YouTube animator Pentamagic. I have had some huge changes to the channel and would be awesome if you could check it out and support some local content creators :D

Don't worry I'll still be animating :)
